name: Notion Expense Tracker
description: This tracker is perfect to add expenses, set budgeting and assess your overall cost expenses performance all under one glance.This template can be used for any business or personal needs as per the user and can be customized for that specific requirement.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding R
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Set your budget, add expenses and assessoverall cost efficiencyfor your expenses.; Ensureproper expenses management.; Get acomplete detailed overviewof all expenses made, their allocations and other metrics.
